metadata.title: CVE-2021-20298 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - negligible.
metadata.description:
OpenEXR: Out-of-memory in B44Compressor

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-20298` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenexr25 - 2.5.4-2
openexr - 2.5.4-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openexr package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.4-2').
